channel.title: Zermon 718 - Unique Contents - ClueScrolls - Duel Arena - Stable Economy
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/246w879.jpg[/img] [url=http://zermon728.info/]Website[/URL] ll [url=http://zermon728.info/forums/]Community[/URL] ll [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Zermon.jar]Download[/URL]
[b]About Us![/b] Zermon is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by our Development Team for players. Zermon aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Zermon has alot of features uncluding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, pvming and alot more. Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest updates about the server. Zermon focuses on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available!
[b]Why should I play?[/b] Zermon is a 718 RuneScape Private Server. First, I'd like to say that, I'm the only developer of Zermon, and I'm making sure that there will always be made new updates constantly every day and bug-fixes and so on. And I will guarantee you that you will not get bored as there are constantly being updated. We're not like any other 718 servers. We're also offering you loads of points system, so you won't get bored easily, and most of the points can be obained by killing certain npcs. We also have a flawless Wilderness system, in the wilderness you will be rewarded with points, and by the chance you will get the opportunity to buy pvp armor and weapons. So what are you actually waiting for? You can play instantly and create yourself a new adventure!
[b]Zermon's Features [/b] VPS Hosted - 24/7 & Lag Free Webclient - Play on Browser Automatic Voting Notes Tab - Write your Notes Slayer Bossing Tasks Clans – Create & Fight against other Xp Counter - Check your EXP Security – Set a Bank PIN Summoning - Scroll & Pouch creation Special Attacks - Spec others Loyalty Points - Play for Auras Multi Barrage & Autocasting Completionist Untrimmed & Trimmed Working Teleblocking Dominion Tower Spirit Shield Creation Corporeal Beast - Kill for shields Three Donator Ranks Staff of Light Drygores, Including Off-Hands Ascensions Crossbow Deathtouched Darts Regular Updates
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/351zhoj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/33ej6up.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2d1wqxc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9amm4z.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

entrinthy rs:

We’ve been working on making the wilderness more useful, added pkp system & wildstalker helmets aswell. More to come!

I tried to check it out, but the client won’t even connect smh.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“entrinthy rs, post:5, topic:551236”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=670153.msg4481271#msg4481271 date=1430056143]

Your links don’t work…

Is it that hard to remove ‘%22’ type a ‘::’ between ‘s//’ and remove " at the end… :palm:
Here you go lazy person…

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Zermon.jar

It should be him who does that not me… How about I just start putting up pictures on a thread, add a bunch of random numbers to the image URL and expect everyone to delete my mistakes. Not happening.
[/quote]

Oh, I am sorry for that mate.
The Links has been fixed now.[/quote]

No worries, my good sir

item.dc:creator: @entrinthy_rs entrinthy rs
item.description:
@entrinthy_rs wrote:

[center]
[url=http://zermon728.info/]Website[/URL] ll [url=http://zermon728.info/forums/]Community[/URL] ll [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Zermon.jar]Download[/URL]

About Us!
Zermon is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by our Development Team for players. Zermon aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Zermon has alot of features uncluding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, pvming and alot more. Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest updates about the server. Zermon focuses on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available!

Why should I play?
Zermon is a 718 RuneScape Private Server. First, I’d like to say that, I’m the only developer of Zermon, and I’m making sure that there will always be made new updates constantly every day and bug-fixes and so on. And I will guarantee you that you will not get bored as there are constantly being updated. We’re not like any other 718 servers. We’re also offering you loads of points system, so you won’t get bored easily, and most of the points can be obained by killing certain npcs. We also have a flawless Wilderness system, in the wilderness you will be rewarded with points, and by the chance you will get the opportunity to buy pvp armor and weapons. So what are you actually waiting for? You can play instantly and create yourself a new adventure!

Zermon’s Features

VPS Hosted - 24/7 & Lag Free
Webclient - Play on Browser
Automatic Voting
Notes Tab - Write your Notes
Slayer Bossing Tasks
Clans – Create & Fight against other
Xp Counter - Check your EXP
Security – Set a Bank PIN
Summoning - Scroll & Pouch creation
Special Attacks - Spec others
Loyalty Points - Play for Auras
Multi Barrage & Autocasting
Completionist Untrimmed & Trimmed
Working Teleblocking
Dominion Tower
Spirit Shield Creation
Corporeal Beast - Kill for shields
Three Donator Ranks
Staff of Light
Drygores, Including Off-Hands
Ascensions Crossbow
Deathtouched Darts
Regular Updates





[/center]
